name: RLPM (Rocket League Puzzle Master)
description:
a Game I created on Scratch is comin' to your desktop! This is free (I do not want to make money I just like entertaining people ;)

Get to the Green spot in order to complete the level.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Black will push you to the side so drive through it in order to complete the Level! I literally grabbed random songs that I thought were cool.
